name: Bad Art Gallery
description:
A short game where you talk to people to get pieces of art, then put them together on a picture frame to see the full painting.

This game was made for Paint Jam 2020.

Tools used:

  • MS Paint
  • RPG Maker MV
  • GIMP

Additional credit:

Yanfly - Plugins

I enjoyed making this game and plan on releasing a more-polished version that meets more of the challenges (such as using only sounds from my mouth as sound effects) in the future!
